title: Fairy Light Skin Tone

adjectives: Magical and ethereal beings often associated with nature.
verbs: Sprinkling stardust and granting wishes with a touch.
nouns: A creature of folklore, often found in enchanted forests.

description: A mythical creature with magical powers, often depicted as small and winged. Represents fantasy, enchantment, and whimsy.
apple_vendor_description: The fairy emoji on Apple devices boasts a delicate, ethereal form with a light skin tone, shimmering with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its translucent wings and soft rounded edges give it an almost magical, otherworldly quality, suggesting enchantment and wonder. This emoji is often used to represent magic, fantasy, or a touch of whimsical charm in messages.
